Articles.Content:
It's just something random I'm working on... still under construction...

The idea I'm thinking about is building a "Space Bar". It could act as an orbital tavern or something to add to interplanetary colonies.

Space Bar under construction

While we're waiting for this thing to finish building... what do wanna drink?

What the bar currently looks like right now...

It's now complete! Press on to the Space Bar!

This is the orbital space station variant. You'll have to send your Kerbonauts into the module that's inside the Space Bar structure. You'll also have to zoom in order to get the Kerbonauts to do EVA in the Bar. Since the structure is fully enclosed, if your Kerbonaut leaves his seat, he'll end up outside...

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I may try to create a Mun/Minmus/Duna variant. It'll include small thrusters to land in these places.

Craft file: http://www./view/3xb9rw0c9bsoc9c/Space_Bar_Orbital.craft
where are the drinks?! i'm not paying entrance fees if there are no drinks! JK it looks awesome
I see what ya did there...
I love innovative ideas like this! It's a nice break from all the boring ol' rockets:wink: Keep it up!
Lol, very nice. Now we know were Jeb hangs out during the evenings.

Well... I decided to send the next Space Bar to Minmus (though this variant was designed for the Mun)

I docked this large rocket stage with the Space Bar to send to the Mun or Minmus

I used the Kerbal Attachment System mod to modify the Space Bar

I placed some pylons and rearranged the existing rocket engines, and added new fuel pumps

This was the first time I sent something to Minmus... landing this thing apparently was no easy task... it was very difficult to control, but I managed to land it. I lost a solar panel after it bounced around a bit...
Clever! I've been thinking of using similar construction techniques to make an orbital dance floor. (I've already designed a disco ball for it.)
As a plus if you run out of Battery Acid Blitzers you can mine Minmus for some Mint Rum!
This is awesome! I like the way the crew cabins lead into the bar.
